Subject: Internet Issue on EPP installed system
Description:
Hi Team,

We are currently experiencing an issue with one of our systems running Ubuntu 22.04. After the recent installation of the Endpoint Protection Platform (EPP), we are unable to access the internet. 

Issue Details:
Operating System: Ubuntu 22.04
Software Installed: Endpoint Protection Platform (EPP) version 12.0 & 11.4.
Problem: No internet access following the EPP installation
Troubleshooting Steps Taken: When disable EPP client its working.
Next_Steps__c:
Asked the customer to test this with the latest version.
Ubuntu 22.04	https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPLinux_v2.4.4.1003/EPPClient_ubuntu_22.04_v2.4.4.1003_x86_64.tar.gz
Solution_Comment__c: The customer confirmed this can be closed.
